title: Traffic grinds to a halt when an armed woman takes a seat - an actual seat - in the middle of a Texas highway

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

A California business owner has been approaching homeless individuals around town, offering to pay for their one-way flight to start fresh somewhere new.

This comes amid the state’s refusal to barely acknowledge the homeless crisis, as the situation continues to worsen by the day.

NEW: California business owner is going up to random homeless people and offering to pay for a one-way flight out of town.

Santa Monica man John Alle believes he has a solution to the homeless problem in Los Angeles.

"What we're seeing now is no accountability. There's no…
title: Local business owner has brilliant plan to solve city's homeless crisis, he's paying them to leave and never come back
